title: Account At Risk Of Deletion!!
body:
I'm in need of a lot of help!

My account (this one) is at risk of deletion because one of my (now former) friends apparently sent a deletion request to Riot!

I've put a lot of time and effort into the account, and when lending it to him (lives in a different state) we changed the email so we'd have a way to play and keep our passwords secure..

Now through his use of the account, when it was linked to his email, he submit a request to get the account deleted permanently..

I know only that email can stop the deletion, but I am TRULY looking for some help.. I have too much at stake to lose.. I'm begging...

P.S He's also shut down all communication between us (blocking and such).

replies.body:
Ouch, that is one rough situation. :/

The best thing you can do right now is to submit a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) ASAP so you can get in touch with one of our recovery specialists and work together to sort this out.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Thank God for your reply..

I sent a request to support yesterday and am still waiting on a reply.

I sent it as something along the lines of 'Unrecoverable Account' or such. Was that right, and do you have an ETA?

From what I've heard, there's only 5 days to cancel it after the request is made.

EDIT: If my account is in the process of being deleted and I cannot login onto the normal client, why am I accepted for PBE? Not complaining though!

It looks like you've already been contacted by one of our account recovery specialists! Continuing to work with them in order to sort your account out is the best course of action. Also, I just wanted to mention that I didn't see any indication that the account is in any danger of deletion.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

I haven't received an email from them at all though!

The email I'm recovering from is the one currently linked!
Targons is there an easier way to communicate?
Account sharing is permaban worthy so I would not tell Riot
